description:
Either it works perfectly for everyone. Or it works for no one. (LOL)

It would be helpful if the author would write more details about this all-important daemon - such that people would feel more confortable installing & using it.

On 22.04 beta and previously on 20.04, I keep getting this apparmor error everytime I open ubuntu snap store this is for a linux PC not a server: 

" An Apparmor policy prevents this sender from sending this message to this recipient; type="method_call", sender+":-1.125" (uid=1000 pid=38523 comm="/snap/snap-store/558/usr/bin/-snap-store " label="snap.snap-store.ubuntu-software (enforce)") interface="org.freedesktop.fwupd" member="GetDevices" error name="(unset)" requested_reply="0" destination=":1.28" (uid=0 pid=4473 comm="/snap/uefi-fw-tools/50/libexec/fwupd/fwupd " label="snap.uefi-fw-tools.fwupd (enforce)") "
summary: Apparmor policy prevents this Sender error
resulta que no abre una vez instalada
